message.content:
cs.SY, cs.LO, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.AI

Reasoning: 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper deals with reachability and control questions for piecewise affine systems, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
- cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science): The paper discusses the complexity of various decidable variants of reachability and control questions, which involves logical reasoning and analysis.
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper involves analyzing the computational complexity of different problems related to reachability and control, which is a core topic in this sub-category.
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity): The paper explicitly discusses the computational complexity of the problems studied, which is the main focus of this sub-category.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): Reachability and control questions are important in the field of AI, and the paper's analysis of the complexity of these problems may be of interest to researchers in this sub-category.
